src:
3 Tim Minati Emre Can, Bagaimana Peluang Manchester United?
03 Nov 2019, 07:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Emre Can bakal menjadi salah satu pemain yang dikejar banyak klub papan atas Eropa di bursa transfer Januari 2020 mendatang. Sejauh ini, terdapat tiga klub yang tertarik pada gelandang milik klub Juventus itu.
Emre Can tidak masuk dalam rencana Juventus pada musim 2019/2020 ini. Pemain berusia 25 tahun tidak didaftarkan pada skuat Juventus di Liga Champions. Emre Can kemudian murka dengan keputusan pelatih Maurizio Sarri.
Belakangan, Emre Can mulai mendapat tempat dan sering tampil di Serie A. Namun, niatnya untuk pindah dari klub Turin belum luntur. Pasalnya, Sarri kini harus kehilangan beberapa pemain tengah karena cedera seperti Aaron Ramsey.
Keinginan Emre Can untuk hengkang dari Juventus diyakini cukup kuat. Niat mantan pemain Liverpool kemudian mendapat sambutan positif dari beberapa klub Eropa. Setidaknya, ada tiga klub yang siap menampung Emre Can di tahun baru mendatang.
text:
3 Teams Are Interested In Emre Can, What Are Manchester United's Opportunities?
Nov 3 2019, 07:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Emre Can will be one of the players pursued by many of Europe's top clubs in the January 2020 transfer market. So far, there are three clubs interested in the Juventus club's midfielder.
Emre Can is not included in the Juventus plan for this 2019/2020 season. The 25-year-old is not listed in the Juventus squad in the Champions League. Emre Can was then enraged by the decision of coach Maurizio Sarri.
Later, Emre Can started to get a place and often appeared in Serie A. However, his intention to move from the Turin club has not faded. The reason, Sarri now have to lose several midfielders because of injuries such as Aaron Ramsey.
Emre Can's desire to leave Juventus is believed to be quite strong. The intention of the former Liverpool player later received positive response from several European clubs. At least, there are three clubs that are ready to accommodate Emre Can in the coming new year.
